name: erefos
description:
Erefos by TinyHop team is an action platformer experiencing the dark side of an inevitable mind.

Made for Ludum Dare 50!⌨️ KEYBOARD CONTROLS ⌨️

Move - Arrow Keys
Jump - Z / Space
Attack - X
Dash - C
Pause - Esc

It should also work on non QWERTY layouts, using the physical layout of the ZXC keys.

Alternative keyboard layout:

Move - WASD
Jump - J / Space
Attack - K
Dash - L
Pause - Esc

🎮 CONTROLLER 🎮

Move - Left stick, D-Pad
Jump - XB A / PS Cross
Attack - XB X / PS Square
Dash - XB B / PS Circle
Pause - XB Start / PS Options


Only the first keyboard layout is shown in the tutorial.

TINYHOP TEAM:

Programming - Alex Podaras

Art - Alex Kaminaris & Vasilis Kaminaris

Music / Sound design - Theodore Moustakas
